Are you running dapper? You might need to upgrade to Edgy for that. Dapper isn't getting any new package versions anymore.
Yeah, that looks like a very new card, doesn't it?
While in general I don't recommend running a 64-bit system, it shouldn't interfere with your card.

For desktop use, you will not notice any performance difference in a 64-bit system. However, you will have compatibility problems with things like Flash, Wine, and media codecs that are only available 32-bit.
